remarks: Associative law for equinumerosity of Cartesian product.  Proposition 4.22(e) of [Mendelson] p. 254.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Jan-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Nov-2014.)
statement:
xpassen.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
xpassen.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
xpassen.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
xpassen $p |- ( ( A X. B ) X. C ) ~~ ( A X. ( B X. C ) ) $.
